main_definition: To become apparent, noticeable or happen.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To get up from a sitting or lying position.
meanings_and_examples.example: After sleeping all night, I arose and began my day.

meanings_and_examples.definition: For something to come into existence or start.
meanings_and_examples.example: A new issue has arisen regarding the budget allocation for next year's projects.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To become a problem or cause of concern.
meanings_and_examples.example: An unexpected rise in temperatures may arise and affect crop production.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A sudden occurrence, typically one that has a significant impact.
meanings_and_examples.example: The discovery of ancient artifacts on the site aroused great interest among historians.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To stand up or get out of bed or another position after lying down.
meanings_and_examples.example: During our morning routine, we often discuss what will arise throughout the day.
